kenya janadhipathiwaraya saha janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithuma athara dwiparshwika erata rajya mandirayedi aarambha wuye marthu masa 15 wanadayi.
ee nisa dawasama hondata hitiyath pati nisa rata nam tikak narak wenawa.

uputaganima mawbima shri lankawe pawathina wyawasthawa thulin janadhipathiwarayata nithyanukulawa agamathiwarayaku dhurayen iwath kirimata nohaki bawata waradi siddhanthamaya arthakathanayak laba demin sitina bawath eya ithamath sawadya mathayak bawath shri lanka podujana peramune sabhapathi mahacharya ji.el. piris awadharanaya karayi.
man giyeth manalige ayiya ekka.
paga mudala laba dimen pasu sabhapathiwaraya ema pa්rabalaya amathamin kiya aththe ‘mun thamayi lankawe inna lokuma kappan tim eka’ yawuweni.
mokada nawakathawe pradhanama thana himiwela thiyenne wijayaba kollayata.
me kathandare kohoma thothanin patangannawada kiyana eka tikak withara prashnayak thamayi.
an sama adahasak, mathrukawak wagema.

kiwwe mata penuna hatiya .
eekata mata kiyanna thiyenne kohomath hamadama mage sinama wicharawalath thibune deshapalana dakmak.
habayi oya wijaya kumaraya ekka aapu wisi this denekuta me mulu ratama jathaka koranta puluwan wunanam ada lankawe inne sinhalayo.
yuddhen passe me serama eyalatane ayithiyi kiyala kiyanne.
prasanna mathithuma samanmali menewiya athulu me sathkaryayata ura dun samata ape pranamaya!
ee manda yath me amumiris mathakaya mage sithata enne indika nisama bawini.
